{- |
= OnPing Data Server

The OnPing Data Server stores homogeneously distributed values
over time, using the binary store format.

-}
module OnPing.DataServer (
    -- * Server run
    runServer
    -- * Away servers
  , AwayServer (..)
  , AwayServerType (..)
  , deadEndServer
  ) where

import OnPing.DataServer.AwayServer
         ( AwayServer (..)
         , AwayServerType (..)
         , deadEndServer
           )
import OnPing.DataServer.Handler (createGlobalVar)
import Yesod.Core (warp)

-- | Run the OnPing Data Server on the given port.
runServer :: Int -- ^ Listening port
          -> AwayServer -- ^ Away server to get old data from
          -> IO ()
runServer p server = createGlobalVar server >>= warp p
